QuestData.Title: Grol'dom's Missing Kodo
QuestData.Description: Friend, if you are traveling south to Thorn Hill, I was wondering if you could locate one of our missing kodos? Not every caravan has made it up the pass from Far Watch Post. Those Razormane brutes hijacked a pack animal yesterday morning. It may not still be alive, but if it is, we cannot afford to lose more of our livestock.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find a missing Grol'dom Kodo somewhere within Thorn Hill in Northern Barrens.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Find a missing Grol'dom Kodo somewhere within Thorn Hill in Northern Barrens.
QuestData.RewardText: This poor battered kodo looks to be on the verge of death, but is still breathing. The Razormane haven't even plundered its cargo yet. If it can be revived, you may be able to save the entire shipment.
